decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Block Plan; Site Location Plan; 15322R - Revision F0 - 1 of 3 (Existing Elevations 1 of 3 Front & Rear); 15322R - Revision F0 - 2 of 3 (Existing Elevations 1 of 3 Front & Rear); 15322R - Revision F0 - 3 of 3 (Existing Elevations 3 of 3 Side); 15322R - Revision F0 - 1 of 2 (Existing Ground Floor 2 of 2); 15322R - Revision F0 - 2 of 2 (Existing Ground Floor 1 of 2); 15322R - Revision F0 - 1 of 2 (Proposed Roof Plans 1 of 2); 15322R - Revision F0 - 1 of 2 (Proposed Roof Plans 1 of 2); 15322R - Revision F0 - 1 of 3 (Proposed Elevations 1 of 3 Front & Rear); 15322R - Revision F0 - 2 of 3 (Proposed Elevations 2 of 3 Front & Rear); 15322R - Revision F0 - 3 of 3 (Proposed Elevations 3 of 3 Side); Heritage and Design & Access Statement (dated May 2023)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match existing and/or those as described on the approved plans.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Retention of drain pipe system to rear elevation.
